title: What's new in v 3.3.1
subtitle: Incredible new animation available
messagePart1: Murmur Master is proud to announce our new cardiac cycle animation, to help you understand how heart sounds relate to the cardiac cycle.

title: We really need your help
summary: Could you help us improve Murmur Master
subtitle: We really need your help
messagePart1: Murmur Master has helped 1000s learning heart sounds but we continually strive to make it better.
messagePart2: We'd really appreciate 5 minutes of your time to review Murmur Master to help us improve

title: A message for those that love Cardiology
summary: We can't wait for what's coming next for Murmur Master
subtitle: Let's be honest
messagePart1: Murmurs are great, but they're not the be-all and end-all. That's why we're expanding our product range to include other aspects of Cardiology

title: Exams coming up?
summary: We've got something that might help
subtitle: Exams can be daunting...
messagePart1: That's why we're offering an exclusive discount on our products, just for UK medical students over the next 1 week. 50% off our regular subscriptions
